name: Path To Lizard Paradise
description:
Made by Reptile Crew

Gamedesigner - Emil Sufiyanov

Developer - Anton Adrianov

3d artists - Max Levinov, Evgeniy Ayupov, Pavel Tarasenko

The alien lizard civilization has lost its home planet.

A ship full of lizards has been making a century-long flight through the stars.

The incubator on the ship had broken down and the population of lizards was out of control!

Can you save the ship and reach its destination - the planet Lizard Paradise?

Each lizard has a profession as well as utility for civilization (stars).


Distribute the lizards to the appropriate compartments.

Each lizard is important, for example, three engineers, in the right compartment, will be able to accelerate the ship to the maximum speed! 

But remember, the ship's capacity is limited!

Lizards with 3 stars have the highest value for the civilization, in order to win, you need at least 5 of them - do not throw them away (and I mean it).

Good luck on your path to Lizard Paradise!

Music by: https://linkrr.ru/KeenkyK
